Package com.lonepulse.robozombie

Contains the core contracts and implementations which are common to all modules.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Directory<NAME,OBJECT> This contract defines a naming service which can be used for binding instances of a given type under an identifier and looking them up using the identifier at a later period.
GenericFactory<INPUT,OUTPUT,FAILURE extends Throwable> This contract specifies a generic policy for a factory.
Validator<CONTEXT> A generic contract for validating metadata and runtime information.
 

Class Summary
AbstractGenericFactory<INPUT,OUTPUT,FAILURE extends Throwable> An abstract implementation of GenericFactory which provides default implementations for the factory methods.
 

Exception Summary
RoboZombieRuntimeException An extension of RuntimeException which signals unrecoverable runtime errors.
ValidationFailedException This runtime exception signals a generic validation failure when using Validators.
 

Package com.lonepulse.robozombie Description

Contains the core contracts and implementations which are common to all modules.

Since:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe
